# Test that basic functions work

# just var args
vim call HelloNil
cmp stdout test.golden

# no args
vim call Hello
cmp stdout test.golden

# single defined arg
vim call HelloWithArg '["World"]'
cmp stdout test.golden

# var args after positional args
vim call HelloWithVarArgs '["London", "Gophers"]'
cmp stdout gophers.golden

# call a function that calls another channel-defined function
vim call Func1
cmp stdout test.func2.golden

# call a function that makes a batch of calls
vim call DoubleHello
cmp stdout test.DoubleHello.golden

-- test.golden --
"World"
-- test.func2.golden --
"World from Func2"
-- test.DoubleHello.golden --
["Hello","World"]
-- gophers.golden --
"London Gophers"
